revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Old Chateau |image = [[File:Old Chateau.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Old Chateau |tokens = 48,000 |location = West of Route 205. }} '''Old Chateau''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 553,000 |- | Rotom || 2,200,000 |- | Rotom forms || 2,300,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Gastly * Haunter * Gengar * Rotom (boss)
Catching Rotom unlocks its forms: * Rotom (heat) (boss) * Rotom (wash) (boss) * Rotom (frost) (boss) * Rotom (fan) (boss) * Rotom (mow) (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
